fields.title: New Post
fields.subject: New Post
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a case you are working on has a new post.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a case you are working on has a new post.

fields.subject: MFA successfully enabled
fields.plain_text:
Hello, 

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that multi-factor authentication (MFA) was successfully enabled on your account.

If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that multi-factor authentication (MFA) was successfully enabled on your account.

If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.subject: MFA successfully removed
fields.plain_text:
Hello, 

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that multi-factor authentication (MFA) was successfully disabled on your account.

If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that multi-factor authentication (MFA) was successfully disabled on your account.

If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.title: You have a new message!
fields.subject: New Message in AdVISE
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that {{ sender }} has sent you a message.  Please login to view the message. 

View Online: {{ url }} (login required)
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that {{ sender }} has sent you a message. Please login to view the message.

fields.title: You were tagged!
fields.subject: You were tagged in a post
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that you were mentioned in a post.

To view the post:

View Online: {{ url }} (login required)


If you would prefer to not receive email notifications, please login to change your email preferences.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that you were mentioned in a post.

If you would prefer to not receive email notifications, please login to change your email preferences.

fields.title: Your group was tagged!
fields.subject: Your group was mentioned in a Case
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that your organization was tagged in a case post.
To view the post:

View Online: {{ url }} (login required)

If you would prefer to not receive email notifications, please login to change your email preferences.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that your organization was tagged in a case post.

If you would prefer to not receive email notifications, please login to change your email preferences.

fields.title: You have a new message reply
fields.subject: New Message in AdVISE
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that {{ sender }} has replied to a message.  Please login to view the message. 

View Online: {{ url }} (login required)
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that {{ sender }} has replied to a message. Please login to view the message.

fields.title: New Case
fields.subject: You have a new case to view
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

We have new information about a vulnerability that may affect your products. We have opened a new to case to share this information. Please login to view the case and the information regarding this vulnerability.

View Online: {{ url }} (Login Required)
fields.html:
Hello,

We have new information about a vulnerability that may affect your products. We have opened a new to case to share this information. Please login to view the case and the information regarding this vulnerability.

fields.title: Case Reminder
fields.subject: You have a new case to view
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

Just a friendly reminder! We have new information about a vulnerability that may affect your products. We have opened a new to case to share this information. Please login to view the case and the information regarding this vulnerability.

View Online: {{ url }} (Login Required)
fields.html:
Hello,

Just a friendly reminder! We have new information about a vulnerability that may affect your products. We have opened a new to case to share this information. Please login to view the case and the information regarding this vulnerability.

fields.title: Case assigned to you
fields.subject: You were assigned a new case
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a case has been assigned to you by {{ assignee }}.

View Online: {{ url }} (login required)
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a case has been assigned to you by {{ assignee}}.

fields.title: New Case Message
fields.subject: You have a new message in a case.
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

You have a new message in case {{caseid}} from {{ assignee}}.

View Online: {{ url }] (Login Required)
fields.html:
Hello,

You have a new message in case {{ caseid}} from {{ assignee}}.

fields.title: Password Recently Changed
fields.subject: AdVISE Password Changed
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy email to let you know that your account password was recently changed.  If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that your account password has recently changed. If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.title: Password Reset
fields.subject: AdVISE Password Reset
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that your account password has recently been reset.  If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that your account password has recently been reset. If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.title: An email has been added to your AdVISE account
fields.subject: A new email has been added to your AdVISE account
fields.plain_text:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a new e-mail, {{email}}, has been added to your AdVISE account..  If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a new e-mail, {{ email}}, has been added to your AdVISE account. If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.title: Email Removed
fields.subject: An email has been removed from your AdVISE account
fields.plain_text:
Hello, 

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a new e-mail, {{ email}}, has been removed your AdVISE account.  If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that a new e-mail, {{ email}}, has been removed from your AdVISE account. If you did not initiate this change, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.title: Welcome!
fields.subject: You are a new member of an AdVISE group.
fields.html:
Hello,

This is a courtesy e-mail to let you know that you were recently added to a new group, {{ group }}, by the group admin {{ added_by }}. If you believe this is a mistake, please let us know as soon as possible.

fields.title: Welcome!
fields.subject: You are invited to join
fields.html:
Hello,

You were recently requested to join the {{ group }} in AdVISE, by the group admin {{ added_by }}. To accept this invitation, please follow the link below to create an account and you will be automatically added to the group.
